title: What should i get?
body: I just bought a $10 rp card what should i get im an adc main but i have basically all of them and i can get them whenever so what should i get?

replies.body: If you're dead set on buying a champ and not a skin, then get something completely opposite to ADC (AP top, perhaps?) because it helps you better understand why people make specific choices that make no sense to your role (e.g. Stand there and die while giving a ton of CC to stop any more deaths instead of running away as you're the carry in the team.)

Skins or ward skins. I'd never buy Champions with RP if you can help it.

Right now there are "random" ward skins for 390RP, basically a ward skin for 40% off as long as you don't care which one you get
